verbs.description: [ARG0: CNN anchor Don Lemon] [V: said] [ARG1: it was his " obligation as a journalist " to call out Donald Trump for all his wrongdoings , including his racism] .
CNN anchor Don Lemon said it [V: was] [ARG2: his " obligation as a journalist "] [ARG1: to call out Donald Trump for all his wrongdoings , including his racism] .
CNN anchor Don Lemon said it was his " obligation as a journalist " to [V: call] out [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: for all his wrongdoings , including his racism] .
CNN anchor Don Lemon said it was his " obligation as a journalist " to call out Donald Trump for [ARG2: all his wrongdoings] , [V: including] [ARG1: his racism] .
